  17. (* Fix up conditional branches that exceed hardware-allowed ranges. *)

  19. module Make (T : Branch_relaxation_intf.S) : sig
  20.   val relax
  21.      : Linear.fundecl
  22.     (* [max_offset_of_out_of_line_code] specifies the furthest distance,
  23.        measured from the first address immediately after the last instruction
  24.        of the function, that may be branched to from within the function in
  25.        order to execute "out of line" code blocks such as call GC and
  26.        bounds check points. *)
  27.     -> max_out_of_line_code_offset:T.distance
  28.     -> unit
  29. end
